DzTime Class Reference
[Basic Objects]

DAZ Script time type. More...

Inheritance diagram for DzTime:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

DAZ Script time type.

Type used for storing and passing time values. Time references in DAZ Studio are stored in 'ticks' - there are 4800 ticks per second. This number was chosen because of its divisibility by typical frame rates. For example, at 60 fps (frames per second) there are 80 ticks between each frame; at 30 fps, 160 ticks; at 20 fps, 180 ticks; etc.
